name: Puzzle Box (itch) (Pliantart525233)
description:
V1: Short puzzle game project that currently has 5 levels.
Currently it doesn't have music and probably have bugs

V2: 5 levels added + New mechanic

V3: 5 levels added + New mechanic 

V4: 5 new levels, choose character color and some improvements

V5: 5 new levels, added light and illumination

IMPORTANT:  The game is ONLY for PC + the first version (V1) can only be opened using winrar(.rar)
